item.title: WY-89 South - Lincoln County
item.description: WY-89 south, taken just south of the US-30 junction.

item.title: WY-89 North at US-30
item.description: WY-89 north at US-30. Use US-30 east for Kemmerer and Fossil Butte National Monument. Use US-30 West/WY-89 North for Cokeville. WY-89 North joins US-30 West to Border Junction.

item.title: US-30 West Approaching WY-89
item.description: US-30 west approaching WY-89.

item.title: BL-80/Bus. US-189 East at I-80 West
item.description: BL-80/Bus. US-189 east at I-80 West/US-189 South (Exit 3) onramp to Salt Lake (Utah). Continue east on the business loop (Harrison Drive) for Evanston.

item.title: US-30 East/WY-89 South at Sage Junction
item.description: US-30 East/WY-89 South at Sage Junction. Turn right to continue south on WY-89 to Evanston (via UT-16 and UT-30) and Logan (Utah). Continue straight for US-30 east to Kemmerer and Fossil Butte National Monument.

item.title: US-30 East/WY-89 South at WY-231/WY-232
item.description: US-30 East/WY-89 South at WY-231/WY-232 in Cokeville.

item.title: US-30 East/WY-89 South at WY-231/WY-232
item.description: US-30 East/WY-89 South at WY-231/WY-232 in Cokeville. Turn right for WY-231 west to Cokeville. Continue straight for US-30 East/WY-89 South to Kemmerer (via US-30) and Salt Lake (Utah, via WY-89).

item.title: US-30 East/WY-89 South Approaching WY-231/WY-232
item.description: US-30 East/WY-89 South approaching WY-231/WY-232 in Cokeville.

item.title: US-30 East/WY-89 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-30 East/WY-89 South. Distance to Cokeville and Kemmerer. This is the first distance marker on US-30 east in Wyoming.

item.title: US-30 East/WY-89 South - Lincoln County
item.description: US-30 East/WY-89 South in Lincoln County. This is the first US-30 shield eastbound in Wyoming.

item.title: US-30 East at WY-89 - Border Junction
item.description: US-30 East at WY-89 at Border Junction. Turn left for WY-89 north to Afton and Jackson; continue straight for US-30/WY-89 South to Cokeville. WY-89 south joins US-30 east to Sage Junction.

item.title: US-30 East Approaching WY-89
item.description: US-30 East approaching WY-89 at Border Junction. WY-89 south joins US-30 east to Sage Junction. While the upcoming junction is in Wyoming, this picture is in Idaho. Milemarker 455 of US-30 in Idaho is in the background.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 6
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 6 - BL-80/Business US-189/To WY-89/Bear River Drive. I-80 West/US-189 South continues towards Salt Lake (Utah). This is the eastern end of the Evanston business loop. Evanston is the last city in Wyoming along I-80 west.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 6
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 6 - BL-80/Bus. US-189/To WY-89/Bear River Drive.

item.title: End WY-89 South at I-80 East and WY-150 South
item.description: End WY-89 South at I-80 East and WY-150 South in Evanston. Turn left for I-80 East/US-89 North/Rock Springs. Continue south on WY-150 for (Wyoming) State Hospital and Wasatch National Forest.

item.title: End WY-89 South at I-80/US-189/WY-150
item.description: End WY-89 South at I-80/US-189/WY-150 in Evanston. Turn right for I-80 West/US-189 South/Salt Lake (Utah). Continue under the freeway for I-80 East/US-189 North/Rock Springs and WY-150 South/Wasatch National Forest/(Wyoming)State Hospital.

item.title: WY-89 South at BL-80/Bus. US-189
item.description: WY-89 South at BL-80/Bus. US-189. Turn left for BL-80/Bus. US-189 to Rock Springs. Continue straight for WY-89 South/BL-80/Bus. US-189 to Salt Lake.

item.title: WY-89 South - Bear River
item.description: Entering Bear River on WY-89 South.

item.title: WY-89 South - Welcome To Wyoming
item.description: Welcome to Wyoming on WY-89 south.

item.title: BL-80/Bus US-189 at WY-89/To WY-150
item.description: BL-80/Bus US-189 at WY-89/To WY-150. Turn left for WY-89 South/(To)WY-150 to Wasatch National Forest. Turn right for BL-80 East/Bus. US-189 South to Salt Lake.

item.title: BL-80/Bus. US-189 West Approaching WY-89
item.description: BL-80/Bus. US-189 West approaching WY-89 in Evanston.

item.title: BL-80/Bus. US-189 West At WY-89
item.description: BL-80/Bus. US-189 West at WY-89. Turn right for WY-89 North to Jackson; left for WY-89 South/BL-80/Bus. US-189 to Salt Lake.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 6
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 6 - BL-80/Business US-189/To WY-89/Bear River Drive. This is the eastern end of the Evanston business loop. Evanston is the last city in Wyoming along I-80 west.

item.title: US-30 West/WY-89 North at WY-89
item.description: US-30 West/WY-89 North at WY-89 north jct. Use WY-89 north for Afton. Continue west on US-30 for Pocatello.

item.title: US-30 West/WY-89 North - Yellowstone Park Directions
item.description: US-30 West/WY-89 North approaching WY-89 North. Use WY-89 North for Yellowtone and Grand Teton National Parks.

item.title: US-30 West/WY-89 North Approaching WY-89
item.description: US-30 West/WY-89 North approaching WY-89 North to Afton and Jackson.

item.title: Routes Divide on US-30 West/WY-89 North
item.description: Routes Divide on US-30 West/WY-89 North approaching WY-89 North junction. The Routes Divide sign is common in Wyoming whenever a multiplexed route splits.

item.title: US-30 West/WY-89 North - Cokeville
item.description: US-30 West/WY-89 North in Cokeville.

item.title: US-30 West at WY-231/WY-232
item.description: US-30 west at WY-231/WY-232 in Cokeville.

item.title: US-30 West/WY-89 North Approaching WY-231/WY-232
item.description: US-30 West/WY-89 North approaching WY-231/WY-232 (not signed). Use WY-231 for Cokeville. Continue on US-30 West/WY-89 North for Jackson and Pocatello.

item.title: US-30 West/WY-89 North Approaching WY-231/WY-232
item.description: US-30 West/WY-89 North approaching WY-231/WY-232.

item.title: WY-89 South
item.description: WY-89 south, taken just south of the US-30 junction.

item.title: WY-89 North at US-30
item.description: WY-89 north at US-30. Use US-30 east for Kemmerer and Fossil Butte National Monument. Use US-30 West/WY-89 North for Cokeville.

item.title: US-30 West at WY-89
item.description: US-30 west at WY-89. Use WY-89 south for Evanston and Logan, Utah. Use US-30 east/WY-89 north for Cokeville.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 5
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 5 - WY-89 North/WY-150/Front St.

item.title: BL-80/Bus. US-189 East at I-80 West
item.description: BL-80/Bus. US-189 east at I-80 West/US-189 South (Exit 3) onramp to Salt Lake. Continue east on the business loop for Evanston.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 3 Offramp
item.description: I-80 east Exit 3 offramp at BL-80/Bus. US-189. Turn left for the business loop into Evanston.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 3
item.description: I-80 East/US-189 North at Exit 3 - BL-80/Bus. US-189/To WY-89/Harrison Drive. Continue on I-80 East/US-189 North for Rock Springs.

item.title: Use WY-89 North (Exit 3) For National Parks
item.description: I-80 East/US-189 north approaching Exit 3. Use Exit 3 for Grand Teton and Yellowstone National Parks via WY-89 north.

item.title: WY-89 South - Welcome To Wyoming
item.description: Welcome To Wyoming On WY-89 South. This is the new style of welcome sign in Wyoming. Taken on the Wyoming-Idaho border.

item.title: To WY-89 on ID-61 South
item.description: To WY-89 on ID-61 south. ID-61 becomes WY-89 at the Idaho-Wyoming State Line.

item.title: US-89 North Approaching ID-61
item.description: US-89 north approaching ID-61 (To WY-89). Use ID-61 south for WY-89, Cokeville, and Kemmerer. Continue north on US-89 for Afton and Jackson. All destinations are in Wyoming. The only instance that I have encountered where state highway shield from another state is posted in Idaho, is at this intersection.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 3
item.description: BL-80/BL US-189/To WY-89/Harrison Drive Exit on I-80 East

item.title: I-80 East Exit 3
item.description: Approaching Exit 3 - BL-80/BL US-189/To WY-89/Harrison Drive Exit on I-80 East, Evanston

item.title: I-80 East Exit 5
item.description: I-80 East Approaching Exit 5 - WY-89/WY-150/Front Street Exit on I-80 East

item.title: I-80 East Exit 5
item.description: Exit 5 - WY-89/WY-150/Front Street Exit on I-80 East

item.title: I-80 Exit 5 Offramp at WY-89/WY-150
item.description: WY-89/WY-150 To State Hospital and Front Street at I-80 Junction

item.title: I-80 Exit 5 Onramp to Salt Lake
item.description: WY-89 at I-80 Junction To Salt Lake

item.title: WY-89 North at BL-80/BL-189
item.description: WY-89 North at BL-80/BL-189 to Salt Lake, and BL-80/BL-189/WY-89/Rock Springs.

item.title: WY-89 North at BL-80/US-189 East
item.description: WY-89 Overhead at BL-80/US-189 Junction

item.title: WY-89 South - Welcome To Wyoming
item.description: Welcome To Wyoming On WY-89 South. This is an older style of welcome sign in Wyoming. The newer signs have a picture of Devils Tower.
